subject: New Song
content: ♪ Crawling flame on a mighty peak. Rudania's Champion, never weak.♪ ♪The hero's power shall grow. Seek trials monuments show.♪ ♪One, stop a titan of molten stone. Two, follow rings of light alone.♪ ♪Three, survive lava's fiery fate. Champion, trials await!♪

subject: Hang Out
content: I found a new Twilight portal! It appeared near Hyrule Castle! Hurry and come over!

subject: Training
content: Why didn't you show up to practice today?

subject: Blue Nightshade
content: I found a small meadow filled with blue nightshade. Want to come and pick some with me?

subject: Rocks
content: The Gorons gave me rocks for breakfast again.

subject: Mystery
content: Looks like something is in the well in Kakriko village.

subject: I got scolded by Dad
content: He keeps saying I need to be a proper princess and focus on getting my powers.
